title: How Is Britain Coping With Lockdown? (with YouGov & Ipsos MORI)
itunes:title: How Is Britain Coping With Lockdown? (with YouGov & Ipsos MORI)
description:
With the British public locked up at home, we get a taste of how they think the government is handling the coronavirus pandemic, and what they're getting up to, to pass the time. Ben Page, chief executive of Ipsos MORI, and Chris Curtis, political researcher at YouGov, join Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek to discuss.

But first, our U.K. government reporter Alex Morales gives us his take on Boris Johnson's possible return to work next week. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
